# Maxima Plotting Examples

## Simple 2D Plot

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 800
#| plot_height: 500
plot2d(sin(x), [x, -10, 10]);
```

## Multiple Functions

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 800
#| plot_height: 500
plot2d([sin(x), cos(x), tan(x)], [x, -2*%pi, 2*%pi], [y, -3, 3]);
```

## Parametric Plot

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 800
#| plot_height: 500
plot2d([parametric, cos(t), sin(t), [t, 0, 2*%pi]]);
```

## Polynomial Plot

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 1000
#| plot_height: 600
plot2d(x^3 - 3*x^2 + 2*x, [x, -2, 4]);
```

## Filled Plot

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 800
#| plot_height: 500
plot2d(x^2, [x, -5, 5], [filled_func, true]);
```

Done!
